description: API implementation requires the database entity to be defined.
mitigation_plan: Task assigned to the same developer.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks all vendor profile API development.

description: Product deletion logic depends on the API contract from the Order Management service to check for active orders.
mitigation_plan: Finalize API contract early in the sprint; develop against a mocked response if the actual service is delayed.
impact_if_delayed: Delays the entire product deletion feature.

description: The CI/CD pipeline requires a functional Dockerfile to build the container image.
mitigation_plan: Task assigned to the same developer.

description: The CSV import worker logic depends on the completion of the robust row validation service.
mitigation_plan: Develop services in parallel and integrate.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks the core processing logic of the highest-risk feature.
